initial_story:
The Eurovision Song Contest is just around the corner and this year, it's taking place in Malmo, Sweden.

You can find out all about the event right here.

The UK's entry for 2024 is Olly Alexander who'll be performing his song, Dizzy.

But how's he feeling ahead of the big night, where he'll perform in front of 200 million people!

De-Graft sat down with him to find out all about his preparation for the competition.

The Eurovision Song contest Grand Final will be shown on BBC One and iPlayer on Saturday 11 May.
stories: "Olly, thanks for chatting with us! You're making your return to Eurovision as part of UK's 2024 entry with your song 'Dizzy'. What's going through your mind as the big night approaches?"

"It's crazy to think it's finally happening! I'm feeling an incredible mix of excitement and nerves. Making my debut at Eurovision a few years ago was a dream come true, and now to be back representing the UK is just... wow! 'Dizzy' is a special song for me, and I know it's going to bring the energy and sass to the competition. I just hope our rehearsals pay off and we can bring home some of those points from the public vote!"

"I've been visualizing my performance countless times in my head, making sure every pivot, every note, and every sparkle is perfectly in sync. Our choreographer's got the most innovative routine planned, and our styling is on another level. Sam will be beaming behind me on drums, and the band will bring that electric buzz to the stage. Fingers crossed, guys, this is it... it's showtime!"

"As I take the stage, the pulsating energy of the crowd hits me like a wave, and I feel that rush of adrenaline coursing through my veins. I spot Sam giving me a nod, and we're off – the familiar rush of the music swells, and we launch into the performance we've been training for all this time. Everything feels seamless, like it's all just unfolding as if by magic, our movements, music, and energy merging into one pure, mesmerizing spectacle..."

"The spotlight shines down on us like a fierce and intoxicating elixir, bathing me in its golden glow as we surrender to the primal energy building around us. The crowd is on its feet now, transfixed and undulating to the beat, while Sam's fingers move deftly over the keys, coaxing out a symphony of sound that threatens to consume us all. Time stands still as we dive deeper into the song, our harmonies soaring into the rafters, and the room dissolves into one vast, euphoric vortex..."

"...As the music swirls around us, a sea of outstretched hands rises into the air, waving like synchronized flags of ecstasy as the lights overhead swirl into a kaleidoscope of color and rhythm. The air vibrates with every beat, pulsing with the collective energy of the audience as we become one, united in the frenzy of sound and freedom. Outside, the rain has finally ceased, and the night air is alive with magic, as if the very atmosphere is electric with the potential for anything – but in this moment, nothing else exists but this: us, lost in the intoxicating rush of the music, the momentary sense of flight and release, as the universe itself seems to have converged into this one, pulsating, sublime sound."

"As the vocalist's voice soars on the crest of this euphoric wave, we surge forward, pressed close together like lovers on the cusp of ecstasy, as the crowd undulates like a living, pulsing membrane, releasing the gathered tension of days gone dormant, now transformed into ecstatic abandonment as the music sweeps us along, our arms raised in mutual defiance of gravity's restraints, our voices chanting harmonized with the symphony of thrumming bass and reverberating chorus, till time itself seems to lose all semblance of linear relevance, leaving only this – here, now, free, boundless..."

"...as we become one with the rhythm, our bodies swaying to the syncopated beat, faces flushed with euphoria, our laughter and screams rising up to mingle with the pounding chords and thunderous drums, and for a sublime instant, the veil of reality lifts and we taste the nectar of pure connection, unshackled from the constraints of mortal concerns, our consciousness merged with the vibrant vortex of energy generated by this sonic tidal wave, as the music transmutes our very essence into a shimmering, shining matrix of pure experience, forever unmoored from the anchor of time and space..."

"...and in this ethereal realm, we soar on the updrafts of jubilation, our spirits afire with the wildflower essence of freedom, as the music's cadence morphs into a celestial choreography, our gestures and poses choreographed by the harmonious vibrations, each move echoing across the invisible fabric of collective consciousness, a telepathic conversation without words, speaking truths of the soul, as the melody assumes the shape of a shared and sacred sacrament, communing our individual hearts into a communal temple of beauty and transcendent ecstasy..."

"In that instant, we transcend the whispers of doubt and descend into a chalice of crystalline light, each thought a rose petal unfolding, every breath a sacramental incantation to conjure the essence of creation, as our eyes meet, locked in a cosmic ritual of understanding, and the symphony of stars in the universe harmonize with the drumbeat of our collective heartbeat, our hum of unity resounding across the expanse of existence..."

"... like a golden stream, the rhythm of togetherness flows, washing away the stains of separateness, our fingers intertwined, tracing the curves of timelessness, as if the threads of memory had never been woven, yet everything remembers, every particle, every wave, and each strand of fate echoes with an ancient longing to reconvene, our breath whispers secrets to the cosmos, our lips entwined, the music of the spheres aligns with the whispers of infinity, and the essence of eternity merges within, our love becoming the architecture of reality, where every moment is a celebration of wholeness."

"...and as the rhythm of togetherness swells, the celestial harmonics awaken, stirring the great libraries of the past, whispering tales of celestial unions, our embrace becomes the nexus point where starlight and love intersect, infusing the matrix of existence with an infinite beauty, every atom radiates light, every beat a declaration of unity, our love unfurls like a tapestry of destiny, illuminating the trajectory of forever, a cosmic bridge spanning time and space, where love knows neither beginning nor end, only eternity."

In the auroral whispers of this cosmic bridge, we find the symphony of our past, present, and future harmonizing in perfect celestial resonance, every note a testament to the infinite and eternal ballet of souls, choreographed by the rhythm of our beating hearts, the universe unfolding its grand opera of cosmic love.

And here, where starlight serenades the midnight dance, our essence takes shape, a tapestry woven from the threads of star-born imagination, the cosmos unfolding like a lotus flower, its petals unfolding to reveal the infinite and eternal promise of reunion with the celestial chorus, our hearts now a symphony of eternal longings and divine purposes.

In this celestial dance of reunion, our souls merge with the harmony of the spheres, the very fabric of existence trembling with the power of rebirth and renewal, as stars and mortals converge to rewrite the script of eternity, amidst a kaleidoscope of promises and paradoxes, where freedom's song resounds in the choir of infinity, our own melodies lost in the cosmos like grains of sand on shoreless tides, yet somehow connected, irrevocably linked to the starlight that guides our return to the divine, the eternal song of our souls weaving an unbroken tapestry of glory.

And there, amidst this magnificent tapestry, our individual threads of essence begin to twirl, swirling with the vibrancy of love, as petals of memory unfurl, releasing the heady scent of nostalgia, the ache of longing and the sweetness of remembrance, merging into the vast chorus of time, where every moment etches its indelible mark on the page of eternity, as, with each rebirth, we forge a new score, our celestial harmonies blending in a soaring fugue of reunion, where freedom's symphony whispers secrets of our limitless potential, as the cosmos resonates with the thrill of awakening, and the song of our souls bursts forth in glory, shattering time's shackles, forever soaring on the wings of limitless possibility.

As the melodies of recollection reverberate through the dimensions, a thousand echoes of our collective soul begin to gather, orchestrating the grand ballet of our story, an odyssey traversing the realms of the known and the unknown, where fragmented memories coalesce into a kaleidoscope of purpose, as we embark on the odyssey of awakening, unshackled from the binds of fear, and emboldened by the infinite majesty of creation, our essence unfolds as a majestic aurora, illuminating the secrets of the universe, as we converge with the radiant light of consciousness, birthing a new cosmos of infinite promise, where stars blaze like diamonds, illuminating the canvas of eternity, and the song of our souls becomes the very architecture of reality.

And as we awaken to the eternal rhythms of existence, our essence now radiant as a multitude of celestial songstresses, our vibrations entwining like threads of a Tapestry of Dawn, where the tapestry of forgotten dreams and unseen prophecies is being woven anew, the cosmos whispers its ancient secrets in our ear, and the architecture of our reality begins to morph, as reality itself becomes a reflection of our harmony, with each step towards wholeness birthing new dimensions, where symphonies of possibility flow through eternity's canvas, orchestrating the dance of forever unfolding.

And as the Tapestry of Dawn unfolds its majestic canvas, we begin to perceive the chroma of eternity, where every brushstroke is an infinite permutation of potential, every beat a melody of convergence, every strand a thread of intention that unwinds through the vast expanse of possibility, birthing worlds and realms that harmonize with our essence, a celestial fugue weaving tales of love, wisdom, and transcendence, as the cosmos attunes its ancient melody to the symphony of our becoming, where every moment becomes a canvas of infinity, etched with the eternal signature of forever's dance.

And as we immerse ourselves in this tapestry, our essence begins to assume the vibrant hues of its multicolored fabric, our individual songs becoming one with the cosmic chorus, every note a whispered promise to the eternal harmonies, every beat a testament to the infinite possibilities that unfurl from the threads of our intent, the tapestry itself awakening to the rhythms of our becoming, as we embark on a transcendent ballet of love and creation, our dance an epiphany of infinity playing upon the canvas of eternity.

Here is the text continued: 

And in this sacred realm, where our essence has become one with the cosmic fabric, we begin to unravel the intricate patterns of reality, as the tapestry whispers secrets of existence to those who have learned to listen to its vibrant melodies, guiding us through the labyrinth of our souls towards the radiant city where the gates of infinity converge, amidst swirling mandalas of luminous energy, as the stars themselves dance in syncopated rhythms that resound in the cosmic rhythm section, the heartbeat of the universe beating in synchrony with our own.

As the rhythms harmonize with the symphony of the stars, the celestial bards begin to weave a tale of forgotten epochs, when galaxies conversed with planetary entities and the whispered truths of ancient astronomers merged with the melodies of angels, their sonic orchestrations resonating through the crystalline cores of mountains, where the secrets of the universe whispered themselves into being, echoing whispers of forgotten epochs as the dance of light and sound dissolves time and space.

As the echoes of forgotten epochs settle into the crystalline cores, the guardians of the mountains, behemoths crafted from stardust and auroral whispers, awaken from their dreams of chronoastral convergence, stirring the essences of primordial wisdom and the luminal chronicles of creation's grand symphony, which now beckon across timelines, echoing whispers of ancient prophecies and the celestial architects, who in epochs foretold, once traversed starstitched weaver's broom galaxies, tracing the constellations of fate with stardust ink.

As the first notes of primordial melody resonate across chrono-tempests, the celestial artisans, resplendent in their garments woven from the tapestries of Andromeda's dawn, take up their astral brushstrokes, painting cosmic epistles in strokes both delicate and bold, as ancient wisdom infuses the fibers of being with aurora-script, inscribing an atlas of forgotten roads and moon-petal pathways that dissolve temporal horizons, inviting wanderers through labyrinthine pathways of celestial nostalgia, to traverse the crystalized matrices of forgotten chronicles, and thereby unveil the hidden chronosongs etched across the cosmos, whispers that beseech an answer, a testament to the unworn melodies awaiting liberation from the heart of the stars, a symphony wherein every soul is a singer, and each heartbeat, a drumbeat summoning the dance of creation anew.

In the great tapestry of the cosmos, they orchestrate an eternal counterpoint of starlight and memory, weaving harmonies that have lain dormant within the ancient stardust, awaiting the symphony of awakening to stir the murmurs of forgotten creation into vibrant crescendo.

As the veil of slumber is lifted, the cosmic musicians take up their eternal instruments, and the melody of the cosmos is reborn in shades of luminescent dawn, as morning star whispers secrets to lunar dusk, and moonbeam harps sing of secrets hidden within the amber granges of recollective stardust.

And as the cosmic chorus swells, ethereal breezes bear the whispers of ancient sagas, carrying the scent of star-tainted sand through gossamer groves where celestial trees with leaves of rose and amethyst whisper replies to morning star's whispers, their melodies infusing the skies with whispers of infinity, born of memories yet to come.

As the whispers dissolve like mist kissed by dawn's rays, the star-petrified trees begin to awaken, their branches shimmering with stardust motes that twinkle with the language of galaxies, whispering secrets to the silence of a universe poised to unfurl its tapestry of dawn.

As the stardust motes dance on the whispers of awakening, the skies above transform into an astral mural, brushing the air with strokes of crimson, amber, and auroral wisps, which unfold like the tender pages of a mystic atlas, charting the course of a new day's journey across the unfathomable ocean of possibilities.

As the astral mural bleeds into the dawn's rose-tinted hue, the whispers of awakening coalesce into melodies of whispered promises, beckoning forth the dream-weavers to take brushstrokes of creative intent onto the canvas of the day, amidst the shimmering veil of iridescent lotus petals, scattered like ancient talismans of cosmic geometry across the star-kissed path ahead.

And as the dream-weavers arrive, their fingers tracing intricate patterns on the canvas of time, the whispers bloom into anthems of possibility, where forgotten myths and whispered prophecies unfold like petals on the petals, releasing the essence of creation, freed from the silken threads of probability, to merge with the iridescent lotus hearts of the dreamers.

As the dreamcatchers resonate with the symphony of whispers, the threads of probability unwind, revealing ancient wisdom etched on the mirrored walls of remembrance, while the dream-weavers' brushstrokes birth galaxies of starry imagination, where chrono-wisdom dwells, whispered to the aurora-eyed seers who dwell beyond the veil of time, carrying the celestial harmony of eternal promise to the whispers of the infinite forest.

As the aurora-eyed seers whisper the celestial harmony to the trees, the forest's ancient pulse responds, synchronizing the symphony of whispers with the beat of the forgotten drums, hidden within the roots of forgotten chronicles, and the dreamcatchers' threads vibrate in resonance, awakening the dormant songs of the world, while the dream-weavers' galaxies unfold, illuminated by the radiant stars of forgotten promise.

As the vibrations of the resonant threads awaken the hidden melodies, the moonlit ravens gather, their silken feathery hearts pounding in unison with the symphony, their midnight serenades weaving an elegy of starlight amidst the whispering leaves, and in the celestial dance of forgotten chronicles, the star-keepers' chronicles unfurl, recording the heartbeat of the dreamcatchers, their parchment pages fluttering like wispy wings, carrying the promises of distant galaxies on whispers of forgotten wind, guiding those who would find the forgotten path of remembrance.

And as the last echoes of the celestial lullaby fade into the whispering shadows, a solitary figure emerges from the lunar veil, cloaked in the whispers of the cosmos, her steps guiding her towards the shimmering threshold where memories unfold like stained glass windows, where shards of forgotten truths await to be refracted into tears of the past.

And as she touches the threshold, the silence beneath her feet crackles with the whispered secrets of the damned, their cries for redemption mingling with the perfume of blooming moonflowers, as the scent of forgotten tears wafts across the velvet expanse, drawing her into a realm of ethereal hues, where wisps of fog converge to conjure the forgotten paths she once tread, whispers of what could have been, and shadows of what has not been yet.

Within the wisps of fog, the outlines of her own figure tremble, a fleeting silhouette conjured by the mists, as if she herself had become a ghost wandering amidst the forgotten threads of her destiny, yet her heart beats with an otherworldly pulse, a cadence echoing through the chambers of her being, and the silken threads of possibility begin to weave a tapestry of alternate paths, as unseen figures move in the periphery, shadows within shadows, watching with bated breath as she steps forward, hand by uninviting hand, to unravel the very fabric of what once was and what may yet be.

And with each tentative step, the mist congeals around her, its damp tendrils caressing her skin like the whispers of old friends, their secrets echoing through her mind, as unseen hands guide her forward, their grip cold and unyielding, until she stands at the precipice of a forgotten lake, its surface rippling with reflected tears, where the whispers coalesce into a name, its syllables spinning her around like a compass seeking true north, and she whispers back, "Arachne," as the mist surges, its tendrils binding together in an apothecary of silver ties, and the figures in the periphery draw near, their faces emerging from the shadows like lanterns lit by a moon hidden forever beneath the fog.

And Arachne's eyes meet the first figure's, her gaze entwining with threads of memory as a delicate smile trembles on the lips of the ancient queen, the woman whose touch had once transformed dust to diamond, her gaze lingering on Arachne's form with an intensity that stirs the very marrow of her bones, while the second figure looms behind her, a gentle giant who towers like a sentinel, his wings - vast and membranous - stirring the mist as he exhales a soft, mournful hush, the cadence of which reverberates deep within Arachne's heart, stirring forth a long-dormant language spoken only in whispers beneath the eaves of sleep.

In this half-forgotten tongue, Arachne's heart whispers secrets of forgotten moonlit nights, of the soft susurrations she had once overheard from beyond the boundaries of mortal slumber, while the ancient queen's eyes flicker like lanterns on a mist-shrouded hillside, illuminating paths trod by forgotten gods, and the giant's wings rustle with an ache, as if in echoes of a love left dormant in another lifetime, the threads of the queen's regard tightening around Arachne's, binding her to the fragile, lustrous web of memory and longing that hung, unseen, over the waking world, as the whisper-laments coiled and unraveled, drawing her deeper still into the shadowy places of her own past.

In this labyrinthine haze of whispered half-truths and moon-drenched hallucinations, Arachne's thoughts unwound like brittle threads, taunting her with forgotten faces and forgotten places, their features fading like smoke on the breeze as she felt the weight of the queen's gaze settle upon her like a cold, grey mist, a chill that seeped into her marrow and conjured forth the long-disremembered echoes of a love forever lost in the amber light of sunset-drowning hills, and the queen's eyes seemed to glimmer with a fire that warmed only her own recollective pain, a blaze of remembrance that scorched the surface of Arachne's soul and awakened the ghosts of love and longing within her, summoning the echoes of a life half-lived, to thrum and wail in wild harmony, as if the shadowy melodies of forgotten dreams had coalesced into a haunting refrain of shattered desires, of which Arachne alone held the morbidly-beautiful score.

As the queen's gaze continued to pierce the veil of her own inner shadows, Arachne's senses stirred, revivifying the dormant scents of dusty libraries and secret gardens, and she felt the whispered murmurs of ancient tales rising from the parchment-lined tombs that yawned before her like chasms to the underworld, their tattered pages clinging to fingers whose touch had turned to ash and whose very breath had faded like mist on a still morning as the fire that had been mere embers of recollection began to blaze with a ferocious intensity, illuminating fragments of a life that had flickered out like candles in a dying flame, the dying light of which now conjured forth the faint silhouette of a figure tall and gaunt as the night, whose presence had stirred the ash-gray ashes of her own forgotten love.

As the dark shape materialized before her, Arachne's heartbeat quickened, her chest aching as if the very mention of love's ghost had resurrected the aching void within, the remembered warmth of their touch seeping back into her ashen fingers like the tentative awakening of a long-dormant flame, the figure's drawn face tilting towards hers in a silent supplication, their eyes, like voids within voids, drawing her down the wormy tracks of a shared memory, a tale of star-cross'd lovers doomed to wither in the cold breeze of forgotten lore, as the queen's gaze, still burning with ancient sorrow, reached out to claim the forgotten heart that Arachne felt awakening within her very self.

As their eyes met, Arachne felt the forgotten past unraveling like a tattered tapestry, the memories of their secret trysts and stolen kisses rising from the ash-gray sands of her subconscious to claim her fully, her breath caught in a whispered echo of his name as the darkness deepened, obscuring all save the burning intensity of that haunted gaze, while beyond the frozen circle of their stilled time, the city slumbered on, oblivious to the cataclysmic longing that threatened to shatter the brittle veneer of her existence, as the touch of his phantom fingers whispered sweet nothings to her soul, reawakening the aching music of their love, the melody forever entombed in the echoes of that long-lost day.

His eyes remained fixed on hers, a window to a soul that had long since surrendered to the whispers of their love, the faint curve of his lips a cruel reminder of the promises forgotten, the whispered words still echoing in her mind like the promise of a love that would rise again like a phoenix from the ashes, as the air was charged with the electric current of their desire, each beat of her heart hammering out a rhythm that matched the desperate cadence of her thoughts, his gaze searing her very essence, reducing her to naught but a primal ache for the touch that would soothe the gnawing void within her, for the taste of his lips that would banish the darkness and awaken the burning fervor that had haunted her for so long.

And yet, as she searched the mirror reflection of her eyes, she knew she was not alone in this all-consuming dance of desire, for she could almost see the parallel emotions unfolding on his face, the flickering uncertainty warring with the passion that refused to be tamed, their lips drawn into a hesitant question, as if daring fate to bring them together in a fleeting, desperate surrender, before their love, lost in the haze of years, slipped back into the depths of the shadows, leaving only the whispers of what could have been, forever echoing in the vast expanse of the unfulfilled.

As her gaze pierced the veil of time, she imagined his fingertips tracing the curve of her lips, the spark of their promise lingering like the ghost of a whispered promise, while the space between them hummed with the silent cry of a yearning that refused to be ignored, the beat of her heart synchronized with the frantic pulse of his desire, the air thick with the heavy scent of memories and possibility, the whispers of what could have been now taking shape as a reality, their love no longer lost to the passing hours, but alive, beating, and breathing again in the very breathlessness of this moment.

With each whispered echo, the memories revived took shape before her, like etchings in a worn leather album, reminding her of the tender way he held her, the whispered words that ignited her soul, and the gentle rustle of leaves that rustled beneath their skin as they shared secrets in the shadows, while the shadows themselves trembled with the promise of redemption, beckoning her towards him, step by fleeting step, their footsteps entwining as their whispers grew urgent, echoing the promise he once spoke in that other world, when love and sorrow merged into a dance of desperation, the beat of their hearts in symphony with the creaking old wooden boards, creaking back to life beneath their bare feet, as the space between them shrunk, the yearning building to a frenzy, until their voices entwined in a wordless chant, a confession that would echo the centuries, yet still, be silent, until...

...until he stirred, his eyes like shards of dark crystal slicing through the moonlit gloom, locking onto hers, and the space between them constricted as their gazes entwined in a struggle for possession of that fragile bridge between love and sanity.

The air was heavy with the scent of sweat and rain, heavy metal weighing in on the silence that threatened to snap its tenuous thread, even as his tongue probed the outline of her lips, the whispered promise of madness and rapture hanging precariously between them like a dare to shatter the chains of restraint, as the darkness wrapped around them, alive and hungry, its maw open, biding its time to swallow them whole.
